name: Block Off
description:
Block-Off is a FREE addictive puzzle game for the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. The objective is to remove all the blocks from the board by clicking on groups of two or more blocks of the same color. There are 5 levels for the game.

[INSIDER TRICKS]
- You can now switch back to the old highscores in the settings app.
- To turn off the sound effects, go to the preferences App, scroll down to Block-Off and turn it off.
- Clear as many blocks at once as possible to score higher, but only through careful maneuvering can you clear the entire board.
